product_name: Garmin Edge 510 GPS Bundle Bike Computer
long_description: This all-in-one Garmin Edge 510 GPS bike computer bundle comes with the new and improved Edge 510 computer, premium heart rate chest strap and GSC 10 speed/cadence sensor for comprehensive ride data.
short_description: This all-in-one Garmin Edge 510 GPS bike computer bundle comes with the new and improved Edge 510 computer, premium heart rate chest strap and GSC 10 speed/cadence sensor for comprehensive ride data.
